sentences.sentence: Special for mullion V-shaped welding and cross welding cleaning.
sentences.translation: 专门用于塑料门窗中梃V型焊接及十字焊接焊缝的清理；

sentences.sentence: Curtain wall custom corner mullion tools and better options for joining curtain wall mullions at corners.
